original_text: When they heard about all he was doing, many people came to him from Judea, Jerusalem, Idumea, and the regions across the Jordan and around Tyre and Sidon.
korean_text: 유대와 예루살렘과 이두매와 요단 강 건너편과 또 두로와 시돈 근처에서 많은 무리가 그가 하신 큰 일을 듣고 나아오는지라

sentences.original_text: When they heard about all he was doing
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그가 하는 모든 일을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: and the regions across the Jordan
